name: Slidetracked
description:
Slidetracked is a minimalist puzzle game with a unique movement mechanic.

Features

  • Unique sliding movement mechanic.
  • 60 handcrafted levels.
  • No tutorial holding your hand, no walls of text. Get started immediately and learn as you go!
  • Minimalist graphics and smooth animations for relaxed puzzle fun.

Learn and master Slidetracked's rules and their consequences and maneuver your way to success!
